com.qtfx.lib.gui

Class FieldContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.gui.FieldContext

  • public class FieldContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Field edit context, normally in a FormRecordPane.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
